EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of NOVOb.CO conference call or presentation 16-Dec-20 3:00pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
Novo Nordisk A/S to Announce the Decision to Enter the Phase 3 Development in Alzheimer's Disease with Oral Semaglutide Call
2880 Bagsvaerd, Dec 17, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Novo Nordisk A/S conference call or presentation Wednesday, December 16, 2020 at 3:00:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript

Event.eventTitle: Novo Nordisk A/S to Announce the Decision to Enter the Phase 3 Development in Alzheimer's Disease with Oral Semaglutide Call
